title: SC EP:17 Ten feet away from a Sasquatch
itunes:title: SC EP:17 Ten feet away from a Sasquatch
description: Vic, former cohost of Campfire Shadows shares audio with us. As Shane and Bear are live from expedition they hope to encounter a Sasquatch but got more than they had hoped for. Join us every Sunday night at 5pm PST as we discuss recent Sasquatch sightings, encounters and talk to Bigfoot eye witnesses. People are seeing something in the woods and there are too many reports for this too be ignored.
